componentArchitecture.description: All UI components follow a three-layer architecture
layers: Layer 2: Customized wrappers (src/components/ui/) - App-specific variants & styling
Layer 3: Feature components (src/features/[name]/components/) - Business logic compositions
componentArchitecture.principle: shadcn primitives are NEVER used directly in feature components. They are always wrapped in customized versions.
